text: [Ej mu'minon] Agar [munofiqon] hamrohi sumo rahsipor mesudand, [ʙa saʙaʙi ʙuzdili va firor az majdoni cang] cuz fitna va fasod ʙarojaton ʙa ʙor nameovardand va mijonaton nufuz menamudand va dar haqqi sumo fitnacui mekardand va dar cam'aton cosusone dorand. Va Alloh taolo ʙa [holi] sitamgoron ogoh ast
